newsitem.title: UK: Mirror names Kane Scottish Daily Record head.
newsitem.headline: Mirror names Kane Scottish Daily Record head.

text.p: British newspaper and television company Mirror Group Plc said on Tuesday it had appointed William Kane as managing director of its Scottish Daily Record and Sunday Mail Ltd subsidiary.
Kane also becomes an executive director of Mirror Group.
Mirror Group said in a statement that Kane was chief executive of Caledonian Publishing Plc until Caledonian was taken over by Scottish Television Plc.
